verses.verse: כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When תֵצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> When thou goest out לַמִּלְחָמָ֜ה <S%H4421><s%> to battle עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against אֹיְבֶ֗יךָ <S%H341><s%> against thine enemies וְֽרָאִ֜יתָ <S%H7200><s%> and seest ס֤וּס <S%H5483><s%> horses וָרֶ֙כֶב֙ <S%H7393><s%> and chariots עַ֚ם <S%H5971><s%> [and] a people רַ֣ב <S%H7227><s%> more מִמְּךָ֔ <S%H4480><s%> than לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> do תִירָ֖א <S%H3372><s%> than thou be not afraid מֵהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> like כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> of them for the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God עִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> with הַמַּֽעַלְךָ֖ <S%H5927><s%> [is] with thee which brought thee up מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וְהָיָ֕ה <S%H1961><s%> become כְּקָֽרָבְכֶ֖ם <S%H7126><s%> And it shall be when ye are come nigh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> unto the battle וְנִגַּ֥שׁ <S%H5066><s%> shall approach הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> that the priest וְדִבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> and speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> unto the people

וְאָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> And shall say אֲלֵהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> unto them Hear יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> O Israel אַתֶּ֨ם <S%H859><s%> ye קְרֵבִ֥ים <S%H7131><s%> ye approach הַיּ֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> unto battle עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against אֹיְבֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H341><s%> against your enemies אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יֵרַ֣ךְ <S%H7401><s%> faint לְבַבְכֶ֗ם <S%H3824><s%> let not your hearts אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּֽירְא֧וּ <S%H3372><s%> fear וְאַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּחְפְּז֛וּ <S%H2648><s%> not and do not tremble וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּֽעַרְצ֖וּ <S%H6206><s%> neither be ye terrified מִפְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> because

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God הַהֹלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> [is] he that goeth עִמָּכֶ֑ם <S%H5973><s%> against לְהִלָּחֵ֥ם <S%H3898><s%> with you to fight לָכֶ֛ם עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> against אֹיְבֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H341><s%> for you against your enemies לְהוֹשִׁ֥יעַ <S%H3467><s%> to save אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְדִבְּר֣וּ <S%H1696><s%> shall speak הַשֹּֽׁטְרִים֮ <S%H7860><s%> And the officers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> unto the people לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> saying מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who הָאִ֞ישׁ <S%H376><s%> What man אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> that בָּנָ֤ה <S%H1129><s%> [is there] that hath built בַֽיִת־ <S%H1004><s%> house חָדָשׁ֙ <S%H2319><s%> a new וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not חֲנָכ֔וֹ <S%H2596><s%> and hath not dedicated יֵלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> depart וְיָשֹׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> and return לְבֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> to his house פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> otherwise יָמוּת֙ <S%H4191><s%> lest he die בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> in the battle וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אַחֵ֖ר <S%H312><s%> and another יַחְנְכֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H2596><s%> dedicate

וּמִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who הָאִ֞ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And what man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> that נָטַ֥ע <S%H5193><s%> [is he] that hath planted כֶּ֙רֶם֙ <S%H3754><s%> a vineyard וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not חִלְּל֔וֹ <S%H2490><s%> and hath not [yet] eaten יֵלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> along וְיָשֹׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> and return לְבֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> unto his house פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> otherwise יָמוּת֙ <S%H4191><s%> lest he die בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> in the battle וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אַחֵ֖ר <S%H312><s%> and another יְחַלְּלֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H2490><s%> eat

וּמִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> and who הָאִ֞ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And what man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> is אֵרַ֤שׂ <S%H781><s%> [is there] that hath betrothed אִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> a wife וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not לְקָחָ֔הּ <S%H3947><s%> and hath not taken יֵלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> depart וְיָשֹׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> and return לְבֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> unto his house פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> otherwise יָמוּת֙ <S%H4191><s%> lest he die בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> in the battle וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אַחֵ֖ר <S%H312><s%> and another יִקָּחֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H3947><s%> take

וְיָסְפ֣וּ <S%H3254><s%> further הַשֹּׁטְרִים֮ <S%H7860><s%> And the officers לְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> shall speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָם֒ <S%H5971><s%> unto the people וְאָמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> and they shall say מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who הָאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> What man הַיָּרֵא֙ <S%H3373><s%> [is there that is] fearful וְרַ֣ךְ <S%H7390><s%> faint הַלֵּבָ֔ב <S%H3824><s%> heart יֵלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> along וְיָשֹׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> and return לְבֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> unto his house וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִמַּ֛ס <S%H4549><s%> faint אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לְבַ֥ב <S%H3824><s%> as well as his heart אֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> lest his brethren's כִּלְבָבֽוֹ׃ <S%H3824><s%> hearts

וְהָיָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> become כְּכַלֹּ֥ת <S%H3615><s%> have made an end הַשֹּׁטְרִ֖ים <S%H7860><s%> And it shall be when the officers לְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> of speaking אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> unto the people וּפָ֥קְד֛וּ <S%H6485><s%> that they shall make שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> captains צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of the armies בְּרֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> to lead הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> the people ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When תִקְרַ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> When thou comest nigh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> unto a city לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <S%H3898><s%> to fight עָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H5921><s%> against וְקָרָ֥אתָ <S%H7121><s%> against it then proclaim אֵלֶ֖יהָ <S%H413><s%> of לְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> peace

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> shall become אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If שָׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> of peace תַּֽעַנְךָ֔ <S%H6030><s%> And it shall be if it make thee answer וּפָתְחָ֖ה <S%H6605><s%> and open לָ֑ךְ וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> shall become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> unto thee then it shall be [that] all the people הַנִּמְצָא־ <S%H4672><s%> [that is] found בָ֗הּ יִהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> shall become לְךָ֛ לָמַ֖ס <S%H4522><s%> therein shall be tributaries וַעֲבָדֽוּךָ׃ <S%H5647><s%> unto thee and they shall serve

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> does not תַשְׁלִים֙ <S%H7999><s%> And if it will make no peace עִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> against וְעָשְׂתָ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> with thee but will make עִמְּךָ֖ <S%H5973><s%> against מִלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> war וְצַרְתָּ֖ <S%H6696><s%> against thee then thou shalt besiege עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וּנְתָנָ֛הּ <S%H5414><s%> hath delivered יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> And when the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> it into thine hands וְהִכִּיתָ֥ <S%H5221><s%> thou shalt smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all זְכוּרָ֖הּ <S%H2138><s%> every male לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> thereof with the edge חָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> of the sword

רַ֣ק <S%H7535><s%> but הַ֠נָּשִׁים <S%H802><s%> But the women וְהַטַּ֨ף <S%H2945><s%> and the little ones וְהַבְּהֵמָ֜ה <S%H929><s%> and the cattle וְכֹל֩ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> is in בָעִ֛יר <S%H5892><s%> and all that is in the city כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שְׁלָלָ֖הּ <S%H7998><s%> [even] all the spoil תָּבֹ֣ז <S%H962><s%> thereof shalt thou take לָ֑ךְ וְאָֽכַלְתָּ֙ <S%H398><s%> unto thyself and thou shalt eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁלַ֣ל <S%H7998><s%> the spoil אֹיְבֶ֔יךָ <S%H341><s%> of thine enemies אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֛ן <S%H5414><s%> hath given יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לָֽךְ׃

כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> Thus תַּעֲשֶׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> Thus shalt thou do לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הֶ֣עָרִ֔ים <S%H5892><s%> unto all the cities הָרְחֹקֹ֥ת <S%H7350><s%> far off מִמְּךָ֖ <S%H4480><s%> that מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> [which are] very אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> are not מֵעָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> [are] not of the cities הַגּֽוֹיִם־ <S%H1471><s%> of these nations הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these הֵֽנָּה׃ <S%H2007><s%> from thee which

רַ֗ק <S%H7535><s%> in מֵעָרֵ֤י <S%H5892><s%> But of the cities הָֽעַמִּים֙ <S%H5971><s%> of these people הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> that יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> doth give לְךָ֖ נַחֲלָ֑ה <S%H5159><s%> thee [for] an inheritance לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תְחַיֶּ֖ה <S%H2421><s%> thou shalt save alive כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> anything נְשָׁמָֽה׃ <S%H5397><s%> nothing that breatheth

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הַחֲרֵ֣ם <S%H2763><s%> But thou shalt utterly תַּחֲרִימֵ֗ם <S%H2763><s%> destroy הַחִתִּ֤י <S%H2850><s%> them [namely] the Hittites וְהָאֱמֹרִי֙ <S%H567><s%> and the Amorites הַכְּנַעֲנִ֣י <S%H3669><s%> the Canaanites וְהַפְּרִזִּ֔י <S%H6522><s%> and the Perizzites הַחִוִּ֖י <S%H2340><s%> the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִ֑י <S%H2983><s%> and the Jebusites כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> hath commanded יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> thy God

לְמַ֗עַן <S%H4616><s%> so אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> may not יְלַמְּד֤וּ <S%H3925><s%> That they teach אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <S%H6213><s%> you not to do כְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> to all תּֽוֹעֲבֹתָ֔ם <S%H8441><s%> after all their abominations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> which they have done לֵֽאלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> unto their gods וַחֲטָאתֶ֖ם <S%H2398><s%> so should ye sin לַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When תָצ֣וּר <S%H6696><s%> When thou shalt besiege אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עִיר֩ <S%H5892><s%> a city יָמִ֨ים <S%H3117><s%> time רַבִּ֜ים <S%H7227><s%> a long לְֽהִלָּחֵ֧ם <S%H3898><s%> in making war עָלֶ֣יהָ <S%H5921><s%> against לְתָפְשָׂ֗הּ <S%H8610><s%> against it to take לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַשְׁחִ֤ית <S%H7843><s%> it thou shalt not destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵצָהּ֙ <S%H6086><s%> the trees לִנְדֹּ֤חַ <S%H5080><s%> thereof by forcing עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> against גַּרְזֶ֔ן <S%H1631><s%> an axe כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> When מִמֶּ֣נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at תֹאכֵ֔ל <S%H398><s%> against them for thou mayest eat וְאֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִכְרֹ֑ת <S%H3772><s%> of them and thou shalt not cut them down כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> When הָֽאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> [is] man's עֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> (for the tree הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field לָבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> [life]) to employ מִפָּנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> accept בַּמָּצֽוֹר׃ <S%H4692><s%> should be besieged

רַ֞ק <S%H7535><s%> but עֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> Only the trees אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which תֵּדַ֗ע <S%H3045><s%> which thou knowest כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not עֵ֤ץ <S%H6086><s%> that they [be] not trees מַאֲכָל֙ <S%H3978><s%> for meat ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֹת֥וֹ <S%H853><s%> תַשְׁחִ֖ית <S%H7843><s%> thou shalt destroy וְכָרָ֑תָּ <S%H3772><s%> and cut them down וּבָנִ֣יתָ <S%H1129><s%> and thou shalt build מָצ֗וֹר <S%H4692><s%> bulwarks עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> against the city אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הִ֨וא <S%H1931><s%> that עֹשָׂ֧ה <S%H6213><s%> that maketh עִמְּךָ֛ <S%H5973><s%> with מִלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> war עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> until רִדְתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3381><s%> with thee until it be subdued פ
